anathema: Kill without thought, execute the innocent, mock the condemned, falsely incriminate another
edict: Perform just executions, study local laws, oppose corrupt or bloodthirsty government officials

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Dammerich (The Weighted Swing)](/Deities.aspx?ID=646)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 11

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Perform just executions, study local laws, oppose corrupt or bloodthirsty government officials

**Anathema** Kill without thought, execute the innocent, mock the condemned, falsely incriminate another

**Area of Concern**
Executions, judiciousness, responsibility

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)

**Favored Weapon** [Greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=376)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=70), [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=95), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=123)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sure Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=1709)

- **3rd**
[Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=1622)

- **4th**
[Mountain Resilience](/Spells.aspx?ID=1610)

</column>
name: Dammerich (The Weighted Swing)
